plays.text: Penalty to Andreas Dackell 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Scott Stevens
Goal scored by Patrik Elias assisted by Petr Sykora and Scott Stevens
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Holding Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Randy McKay 2 minutes for Roughing DOUGLAS GILMOUR
Penalty to Randy McKay 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Mike Ribeiro assisted by Richard Zednik and Yanic Perreault
Goal scored by Brian Rafalski assisted by Patrik Elias and Colin White
Penalty to Yanic Perreault 2 minutes for Slashing Turner Stevenson
Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Savage
